data.name: Golurk

ancientTrait.name: θ Stop
ancientTrait.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's Pokémon's Abilities done to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Double Type
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is in play, it is Psychic and Fighting type.

attacks.name: Superpower
attacks.text: You may do 40 more damage. If you do, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

data.name: Golurk

attacks.name: Dig Out
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a Fighting Energy card, attach it to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Double Lariat
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 90 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

data.name: Golurk

attacks.name: Iron Fist of Justice
attacks.text: If you have any Team Plasma Pokémon in play, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Shadow Punch
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

data.flavorText: Golurk were created to protect people and Pokémon. They run on a mysterious energy.

data.name: Golurk

attacks.name: Triple Smash
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 60 more damage for each heads.

data.flavorText: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokémon by the ancient people who made them.

data.name: Golurk

attacks.name: Wreck
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 60 more damage. Discard that Stadium card.

data.flavorText: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokémon by the ancient people who made them.

data.name: Golurk

attacks.name: Devolution Punch
attacks.text: Devolve the Defending Pokémon and put the highest Stage evolution card on it into your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Ghost Hammer
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon has no Weakness.

data.flavorText: It flies around the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

data.name: Golurk

attacks.name: Hammer Arm
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Hurricane Punch
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokémon by the ancient people who made them.

data.name: Golurk
data.flavorText: Artillery platforms built into the walls of ancient castles served as perches from which Golurk could fire energy beams.

data.name: Golurk

attacks.name: Rock Tumble
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Fist of Antiquity
attacks.text: If you have any Supporter cards in your discard pile, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: Some say that ancient people invented Golurk to serve as a laborer. It follows its master's orders faithfully.

data.name: Golurk

attacks.name: Devolution Punch
attacks.text: Devolve the Defending Pokémon and put the highest Stage evolution card on it into your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Ghost Hammer
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon has no Weakness.

data.flavorText: This extremely rare Pokémon is a different color than usual. It is very hard to find.

data.name: Golurk

attacks.name: Reinforced Punch
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Megaton Fall
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: There's a theory that inside Golurk is a perpetual motion machine that produces limitless energy, but this belief hasn't been proven.

data.name: Golurk V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Rewind Beam
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an evolved Pokémon, devolve it by putting the highest Stage Evolution card on it into your opponent's hand.

data.name: Golurk V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Rewind Beam
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an evolved Pokémon, devolve it by putting the highest Stage Evolution card on it into your opponent's hand.

data.name: Golurk V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Rewind Beam
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an evolved Pokémon, devolve it by putting the highest Stage Evolution card on it into your opponent's hand.

data.name: Golurk

attacks.name: Big Hand
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each card in your hand.

data.flavorText: Artillery platforms built into the walls of ancient castles served as perches from which Golurk could fire energy beams.

data.name: Golurk

attacks.name: Iron Defense
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks.

attacks.name: Fighting Fist
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex or Pokémon V, this attack does 120 more damage.

data.flavorText: Artillery platforms built into the walls of ancient castles served as perches from which Golurk could fire energy beams.

data.name: Golurk

attacks.name: Double Smash
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage for each heads.

data.flavorText: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.
